definition: A cultivated area of land, typically located on slopes or hillsides, where grapevines are grown for the purpose of producing wine.

examples.english: The vineyard is located on the slope.

examples.german: Die Winzer ernten die Trauben im Weinberg.
examples.english: The winemakers harvest the grapes in the vineyard.

examples.german: Der Weinberg erstreckt sich Ã¼ber mehrere Hektar.
examples.english: The vineyard extends over several hectares.
Different grape varieties grow in the vineyard.

examples.german: Der Weinberg bietet eine malerische Aussicht auf die Landschaft.
examples.english: The vineyard offers a picturesque view of the landscape.
